pos_mean_info_list.mean: 相当好地；体面地；可敬地
体面；可尊敬；有社会地位

word_group.brief_definition: 体面的家庭；尊敬的家庭

bilingual.source: Dicken's mother supposedly came from a more respectable family.
bilingual.target: 据说狄更斯的母亲来自一个更体面的家庭。

bilingual.source: She wrote dull, respectable articles for the local newspaper.
bilingual.target: 她为当地报纸写了一些枯燥、体面的文章。

bilingual.source: It is not respectable to be drunk in the street.
bilingual.target: 醉倒在大街上不是件体面的事.

bilingual.source: The host was a respectable-looking, middle-aged man.
bilingual.target: 老板看上去是位体面的中年人。

bilingual.source: He wishes to straighten up and lead a respectable life.
bilingual.target: 他希望改邪归正,过体面的生活.

bilingual.source: There were twelve families here, respectable enough, but nothing like the Vances.
bilingual.target: 这里住着十二户人家, 都是很体面的人, 但是远不及万斯夫妇.

bilingual.source: Besides being an upright and respectable woman Mrs Baroda was also a sensible one.
bilingual.target: 巴罗达太太不仅是位正派体面的女子,也是位非常明智的女子.

bilingual.source: What on earth are you doing in a nasty place like shantytown you a respectable darky?
bilingual.target: 你到底在棚户区这个糟糕的地方干什么，你是个体面的黑人呀？

bilingual.source: And, above all things, I wished the result of my endeavours to be respectable, proper, en regle.
bilingual.target: 尤其是我希望自己努力得来的成果是体面的、正当的、en regle。

bilingual.source: It won't do for a respectable bank gentleman like you, to be seen speaking to him publicly, you know.
bilingual.target: 像你这样体面的银行人员公开跟他说话是不行的，这你知道。

yingyinNormal.en: Her father didn't want her to see me. She was from a very respectable family. Mine was, you know, not so respectable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她爸爸不希望她和我联系，她出身名门望族，而我家却，你懂的，没什么名望。

yingyinNormal.en: And an English earl as a brother-in-law will make him respectable?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有个英国伯爵妹夫，他就显得高尚了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: They were looking for respectable types, preferably virgins. They liked to train them from scratch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们寻找佳丽，只要处女，想从零开始训练她们。

yingyinNormal.en: I am not the sort of female to torment a respectable man. Please understand me, I cannot accept you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是那种故意捉弄尊敬绅士的女性，请理解我，我不能接受你。

yingyinNormal.en: He is just a front for Wolfshiem, a gangster to get his claws into respectable folk like Walter Chase.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他只不过是沃尔夫山姆的马前卒，引诱沃尔特·切斯这样的上流人士上钩的小弟。

yingyinNormal.en: The only respectable thing about you, old sport, is your money. Your money, that's it. Now I've just as much as you. That means we're equal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 老伙计，你身上唯一上流的东西是你的钱，仅此而已，而我的钱和你不相上下，我们平起平坐。

yingyinNormal.en: No one will believe you, a dirty servant girl without a family, if you lay claim to the prince's heart. But with a respectable gentlewoman to put you forward, you will not be ignored.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没人会相信你，一个没有家人的肮脏女仆，若你自称是王子的心上人。但若一个贵妇人举荐你的话，就不会有人忽视。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Dicken's mother supposedly came from a more <highlight>respectable</highlight> family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据说狄更斯的母亲来自一个更体面的家庭。

examination_example.sentence: His father was a clerk in the British Navy pay office — a <highlight>respectable</highlight> position, but with little social status.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的父亲是英国海军薪酬办公室的一名职员——一个体面的职位，但没有什么社会地位。

examination_example.sentence: Monarchs are kept as head of state in Europe mostly owing to their undoubted and <highlight>respectable</highlight> status.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 君主在欧洲被保留为国家元首，主要是因为他们无可置疑和受人尊敬的地位。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
